title: Bug 19089: No popup menu in java editor ruler (Photon)
description: Bug 19089: No popup menu in java editor ruler (Photon)
OB: 1) When a java editor is opened, there is no popup menu when right-clicking on the left vertical ruler. The expected menu should allow adding breakpoints or marks, but it does not appear.
EB: The java editor should display a popup menu when right-clicking on the left vertical ruler. This menu should provide options to add breakpoints or marks.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1) Open a java editor. 2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler. The popup menu to add breakpoints or marks should not appear.
